TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EventKeyword extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a keyword for an event. Keywords are defined in an event provider and are used to group the event with other similar events (based on the usage of the events).

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class cannot be instantiated. A <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.ProviderMetadata> object defies a list of <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventKeyword> objects, one for each keyword used by the provider events. Each keyword is a bit in a 64-bit mask. Predefined bit values and reserved bits occupy the top 16 positions of this mask, leaving the manifest to use any bits between 0x0000000000000001 and 0x0000800000000000.
The standard event keywords are defined in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.StandardEventKeywords> enumeration.

Docs.summary: Gets the localized name of the keyword.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains a localized name for this keyword.

Docs.summary: Gets the non-localized name of the keyword.
Docs.value: Returns a string that contains the non-localized name of this keyword.

Docs.summary: Gets the numeric value associated with the keyword.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Each keyword is a bit in a 64-bit mask. Predefined bit values and reserved bits occupy the top 16 positions of this mask, leaving the manifest to use any bits between 0x0000000000000001 and 0x0000800000000000.
